General.Name: Lafarge Malayan Cement Bhd
General.Description: Malayan Cement Berhad, an investment holding company, produces, manufactures, and trades in cement, clinker, drymix, ready-mix concrete, and other building materials and related products primarily in Malaysia and Singapore. The company operates through Cement, and Aggregates and Concrete segments. In addition, it trades in and imports cement, other building materials, and aggregates and related products; ships bulk cements and charters vessels; manages and operates a jetty; and quarries and trades in granite and quarry products. Further, it provides accounting shared and management consulting, and waste management services. The company was formerly known as Lafarge Malaysia Berhad and changed its name to Malayan Cement Berhad in September 2019. Malayan Cement Berhad was founded in 1950 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Malayan Cement Berhad is a subsidiary of YTL Cement Berhad.
